resources.string: Start Volume Power on boot up
Turn screen off from notification bar
This preference will take effect on restart of the service.

Warning! Removing the screen off notification from the notification bar greatly increases the likelihood that the operating system will kill the app if it stays in the background too long, rendering it useless until a manual restart. This preference will take hold on restart of the service.
"By disabling this app's ability to lock your device's screen greatly increases the likelihood that the operating system will kill the app if it stays in the background too long."
